title: Actions for Bill H.4947
textBeforeTable: SECTION 1.  Notwithstanding any general or special law, rule or regulation to the contrary, the trial court of the commonwealth shall establish a sick leave bank for Edward A. Driscoll an employee of the Office of the Commissioner of Probation.  Any employee of the trial court may contribute 1 or more sick, personal or vacation days to the sick leave bank for use by Edward A. Driscoll.  Upon such time as said Edward A. Driscoll termination employment with said trial court or requests to dissolve said sick bank the balance of sick leave shall be transferred to the tri al court paid leave bank.               Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives in General Court assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows:   Whereas , the deferred operation for this act would tend to defeat its
